name: Town of Currency
description:
Your home town Currency has been overrun by danged extra terrestrials! Grab your shotgun and protect your way of life.

Description

Town of Currency is a fast-paced shooter (that starts out slowly) where you face an endless onslaught of aliens. Make sure to get a score of at least 100 to see the outhouse surprise.

Controls: Mouse to shoot and aim, WASD or arrow keys to move around.

Leaderboard

The leaderboard, kindly hosted by Game Jolt, can be found here: https://gamejolt.com/games/town_of_currency/410953/scores/417265/best

Please keep it family friendly, or we will have to remove your scores or shut down the feature altogether.

Known issues
  • Ground tiles can sometimes flicker on systems with Nvidia graphic cards.
Credits

Created by two programmers during 72 hours for Ludum Dare 44 "Your life is currency", that busily tried to scramble together some acceptable art.

Check out this link to the music, featuring a bonus track not available in game!
